body.name: Sceptre Curved 27" FHD 1080p 75Hz LED Monitor HDMI VGA Build-In Speakers, EDGE-LESS Metal Black 2019 (C275W-1920RN)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 19 mins
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 4 hrs 19 mins
features: 1500R Curved Display: The 1500R degree curved design immerses you completely into the gaming landscape, allowing you to spot all threats and opportunities before all of your competitors.
98% sRGB: With 98% sRGB, this monitor offers a wider color gamut than most conventional monitors, giving deeper colors and defining features.
Multiple Ports: Two HDMI and one VGA port each accelerate refresh rate up to 75Hz, providing the visual edge you need to defeat the competition during all of your gaming exploits.
Adaptive Sync: Adaptive Sync is a technology that closes the gap between the graphics card's and the monitor's refresh rates, eliminating image tearing and stuttering in the process.
Built-in Speakers: Perfectly suited to work & gaming settings, built-in speakers deliver robust & smooth audio while saving space on your desk.
Blue Light Shift: Blue Light Shift reduces blue light, allowing you to comfortably work, watch, or play applications without straining your eyes.
Tiltable Display: A display that tilts 15° backward and 5° forward allows you to find a sweet spot that bridges clarity and comfort.

VESA Wall Mountable: The VESA wall mount pattern gives you the freedom to select the optimum viewing position for your monitor, eliminate cable clutter, and save valuable space for your gaming and work station.

30+ years of Experience: Founded in City of Industry, CA over 30 years ago, Sceptre Inc. made a promise to create & deliver superior products for remarkably affordable prices, a rare tradition that continues today.
body.description: With the C275W-1920RN, a slender 1800R screen curvature yields wide-ranging images that seemingly surround you. Protection and comfort are the hallmarks of this design as the metal pattern brush finish is smooth and pleasing to the touch. 1080P resolution (1920 x 1080 pixels) provides stunning color and picture detail on a 24 inch screen. Enjoy VGA and HDMI inputs to connect all video and gaming devices. 27" Curved monitor 1920 x 1080 Full HD resolution up to 75Hz refresh rate Fast response time HDMI, VGA & headphone ports dimensions with stand (inches) 24.27”X 9.01”X 17.69” inches without stand (inches) 24.27” x 2.56” x 14.43” packaging Dimension (inches) 27.99”X 5.43”X 18.74” inches HDMI; VGA.The brightness is 250 CD/M2. Viewing Angle: 178˚ (Horizontal) / 178˚ (Vertical).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: Bought it wasn’t expecting much, does have really good visual but you will need some sort of speakers because the ones built in are lame besides that really good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great monitors. Horrible stands.
reviews.reviewText: Bought these to replace 3 flat 24" Sceptre's. The monitors (themselves) are very nice but the stands absolutely suck if you're trying to align 2 or more of them. Fortunately, I bought a 3 monitor stand that let me align them perfectly. In short, the monitors are well worth the $$$ but, if you have 2 or more, use a multi-monitor stand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Took 10 mins to set up
reviews.reviewText: This is great I’m definitely ordering 1 or 2 more of these! Took me 10 mins or less to set up, no driver installation needed. Plugged in and set up extended display in display settings on my laptop. Works like a dream and the screen is perfect. I work from home so I am looking at my screen for a minimum of 8 hrs a day, I was using smaller 22 inch monitor, so I can already tell this will be a major upgrade and easier on my eyes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sceptre C275W-1920RN: A Curved Monitor that Exceeds Expectations for Budget-Minded Techies
reviews.reviewText: As a tech enthusiast, I'm always on the lookout for gear that punches above its weight class. The Sceptre C275W-1920RN curved monitor definitely fits that bill. While it might not be the most extravagant display on the market, it delivers exceptional value for its price point, making it a strong contender for anyone seeking a step up from their basic monitor.Immersive Curve and Refreshing Rate:The 27-inch curved display is the star of the show. The 1800R curvature subtly wraps around your field of view, creating a more immersive experience, especially for movies and games. I found myself leaning in less and feeling more engaged in the content. The 75Hz refresh rate is another big plus, offering smoother visuals compared to standard 60Hz monitors. While not the highest refresh rate available, it's a noticeable improvement, particularly for fast-paced content.Visual Quality:The 1080p resolution delivers decent image quality, especially considering the price. Colors are vibrant, and details are reasonably sharp. While not ideal for professional photo editing, it's perfectly adequate for everyday tasks, casual gaming, and entertainment. The viewing angles are also impressive, with minimal color shift even at off-center positions.Built-in Speakers and Design:The built-in speakers are a convenient feature, but their sound quality is unremarkable. They're fine for basic audio needs, but for anything more immersive, you'll definitely want to connect external speakers or headphones. The edge-less design looks sleek and modern, adding a touch of sophistication to any desk setup. The included stand offers tilt adjustments, but lacks swivel or height functionality.Value and Conclusion:For around $120, the Sceptre C275W-1920RN offers incredible value. It packs a curved display, a 75Hz refresh rate, and decent image quality into an attractive package. While it might not have all the bells and whistles of high-end monitors, it delivers an impressive experience for casual users and budget-conscious gamers. If you're looking for a significant upgrade from your basic monitor without breaking the bank, this Sceptre is definitely worth considering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price and quality
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a friend for his birthday and he can't say enough about how awesome the picture quality is on this monitor. He's thoroughly enjoying his new monitor. I'm pretty sure he thanked me for about a week. Evidently you can't go wrong with the price and quality of this monitor, and yes he is a big gamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick Delivery. Functions as indicated.
reviews.reviewText: Display is great. The 75Hz is useful. The speakers are not very loud, but I have a speaker system anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It has some decent reviews on Amazon and it seems to be very popular product. As I have a 24" curved monitor. It just did not have the viewing area I needed although it works very well. I looked at several 27's and 32's. A 32" was a bit big for my desktop and the 27" I thought might fill the bill. I looked at several in the same basic price range. there were a few refurb's for a very good price but I wanted a new one. I found the sceptre C27 curved for $99.00 new on sale. I read a lot of the reviews, likes and dislikes and most were very positive. So I purchased one. It arrived today and after unboxing it. the mounting the stand very easy and the monitor setup (read the manual) is a breeze. I'd much rather have the monitor controls on the front of the monitor as I do not like reaching around the back of the monitor to adjust the screen settings. the rear facing built in speakers. I never enabled them so I have no idea how they sound Overall I'm pleased with the C27. A very good price for a 27" 1080p monitor. I do play a few games and so far its done well. Looking for a decently priced 27" monitor? I do not think you could go wrong with one of these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars singular dead pixel
reviews.reviewText: beautiful monitor, displays graphics nice enough for the quality it’s limited to. my only issue is the fact that there is a singular dead pixel on the bottom of my screen, but it doesn’t really disrupt my gameplay so it doesn’t really bother me. but if that’s something that would bother you, please do not buy this. I’ve noticed it since the start and sometimes it annoys me but not enough to make me hate it lol.
Excelente producto supero mis expectativas por el precio 👌

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelante relación de calidad precio del producto.
reviews.reviewText: Al llegar el paquete lo primero que se advierte es que la compañia fabricante de Spectre, juega limpio y para ganar. Todo viene muy bien cuidado y su presentación es impecable.Armar la base y la pantalla es sencillo si sigues las instrucciones.La pantalla tiene una muy buena imagen comparando su calidad y precio. Inmediatamente notas la belleza de las fotos y videos que muestra al navegar por tus archivos o por el internet se ve mas vivo.El punto debil (igual que otras pantallas del segmento) es su audio, pero no me afecta porque tengo bocinas externas muy buenas.Ahora uso este monitor como principal para leer, editar videos y mas.Deseo esta reseña sea de provecho para quienes buscan un monitor con una excelente relación calidad - precio.

This monitor is exactly as advertised. I am very please with the image quality, refresh rate, sharpness and colour. The product seems pretty solid and the price was excellent for the product delivered. I have not used this monitor for gaming as of yet, but at first impression, it is a great bargain.
